overview.en: CTH is the token of the Crypto Trade Hub. The Crypto Trade Hub will establish an open, win-win and long-term operational mechanism through CTH to liberate the roles of the various players in the alliance and continuously strengthen the overall strength of the alliance.
overview.zh: CTH是数字资产交易联盟的通证，是联盟内数据、权利、收益流通统一的载体。数字资产交易联盟将通过CTH建立起一套公开、共赢、长效的运转机制，解放联盟内各角色的生产力，不断强化联盟的整体实力。
